description: {"blocks":[{"key":"a0lns","text":"We propose a total of 10 C57BL/6 mice (5 males and 5 females) to be studied for each study group or cellular senescence inducer intervention.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
ethics_statement: {"blocks":[{"key":"f2qrr","text":"All animal procedures were approved by Jackson Laboratory and the Icahn School of Medicine at Mount Sinai.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

groups.title: Cellular Senescence Network (SenNet) Method Development Community

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"bdj7a","text":"Males and females are grouped and housed in standard cages, provided LabDiet 5K0G and acidified water ad libitum. Euthanasia is performed by cervical dislocation (CMQ93-26).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4cfs9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5mk26","text":"Control: Tissues collected at 32 weeks.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":8}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6s2p7","text":"Doxorubicin: IP injection (5 mg/kg) at 26 weeks on days 0 and 10, with tissue collection at 32 weeks.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":12}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"696bn","text":"Palbociclib: Daily oral gavage (150 mg/kg) for 10 days starting at 26 weeks, with tissue collection at 32 weeks.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":12}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cu1il","text":"High-Fat Diet: From 24 weeks, animals receive a 45% fat diet until tissue collection at 32 weeks.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":14}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5lfe3","text":"Aging Controls: Tissues collected at 24 months.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":15}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1f1gp","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5ct65","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fqo60","text":"Preparation: After euthanasia, apply 70% ethanol to the throat to wet the fur.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":12}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7stru","text":"Incision: Lift the skin and make a vertical cut on the throat to expose the salivary glands. Use forceps to expose the trachea.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":9}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"diln3","text":"Tracheal Access: Make a horizontal incision between the second and third tracheal rings. Insert a 19G cannula and secure it with a suture thread.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":16}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"bffj2","text":"Centrifuge BAL sample: 3,000 rpm, 10 min, 4°C","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9ct3m","text":"Transfer the supernatant (=BALF) to a new E-tube (label: BALF) → dry ice or liquid nitrogen → -80'C","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2f7in","text":"Slowly inject 0.8 mL of ice-cold PBS into the lungs (speed: 0.1 mL/sec), pause for 2 – 3 sec, and then slowly retrieve the BAL. Record the collected volume of BAL and transfer BAL to theE-tube (label: BAL cells) on ice. Repeat Steps with another 0.8 mL of ice-cold PBS. Save the BAL in one tube/sample.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"eeuqe","text":"Save the collected BAL on the ice during harvest and then continue for the “BALF and BAL cell separation”","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6ohtd","text":"procedure","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3fup7","text":"Optional: Go to \"Bronchoalveolar Lavage Collection\"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":51}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"49hvm","text":"Lung Isolation: Carefully remove the lung with the trachea and cannula intact.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":15}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f21ee","text":"Tissue Processing:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":18}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2fbn1","text":"Right Lobe: Isolate, freeze in liquid nitrogen, and store at -80°C.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":11}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7cm2b","text":"Left Lobe: Fix in 10% formalin overnight, transfer to 70% ethanol, and prepare for histology.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":10}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"75te8","text":"CRITICAL: Cell pellet + 1 mL room temperature RBC lysis buffer → immediately vortex for 3 seconds →","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d2sfd","text":"Incubation: 5 min, ice. Incubation time is critical.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"b6s7k","text":"Centrifuge: 3,000 rpm, 10 min, 4°C","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"81c1i","text":"Discard supernatant using a pipette. Do not disturb the pellet.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a8bg5","text":"If you want to count the WBC, proceed to step 5. Or you can save BAL cell → dry ice or liquid nitrogen →","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3hsse","text":"-80'C","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ai7t6","text":"Optional: Cell pellet + 500 uL of ice-cold PBS. Make the single-cell suspension by pipetting. CRITICAL Un-even cell suspension affects cell number as well as the quality of the Cytospin","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bel9a","text":"Open the abdominal cavity. Remove all abdominal organs to reveal the inferior vena cava, which is located in the middle of the back of the body.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fpu0f","text":"Optional: Go to \"Blood Collection and Serum Separation\"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":55}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2ilvr","text":"Insert a 26G syringe into the inferior vena cava and collect the blood slowly.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ih2l","text":"Transfer the collected blood to the e-tube. CRITICAL do not drop the blood. gently transfer the blood from","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f2999","text":"the syringe to E-tube unless RBC is destroyed and affects the colorimetric analysis.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"86do9","text":"Leave the tube at room temperature for 30 min. Do not close the lid","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"4rd5t","text":"Close the lid and centrifuge: 1,000 g, 10 min, 4°C","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"11puq","text":"Collect the supernatant (=serum) carefully and transfer it to a new e-tube. Saved it at -80'C","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4qt6o","text":"Materials: 26G needle, 1 mL syringe, balance, surgical board, 70% EtOH, scissors, 2 forceps, suture thread, 19G cannula, E-tube (1 per sample), normal formalin, tools for lung inflation, histology container with 10 mL of normal formalin (1 per sample)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":10}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fn62","text":"Materials: 26G-syringe, 70% ethanol spray, surgery board with needles/pins, 2 forceps, 1 scissors, 4.0-suture string, 19G-cannula (brown color), PBS, 1 mL syringe, e-tube, notebook/paper, pens","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":11}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d98dn","text":"Materials: 1 mL pipette, tips, e-tubes, marker pen, dry ice, waste bin, e-tube rack, timer, PBS (keep on ice), ice bucket, RBC lysis buffer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":10}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e0d83","text":"Materials: 26G-syringe, surgery board with needles/pins, 1 forceps, 1 scissors, 23G-syringe, e-tube","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":11}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Sinai SCENT TMC - 5x5 Project Mouse Harvesting
